Package com.turbomanage.httpclient

Minimal HTTP client wrapping HttpURLConnection.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AsyncRequestExecutor Describes a class that can execute a request asynchronously.
AsyncRequestExecutorFactory Factory that provides an async wrapper for a request, that is, something that can execute a request asynchronously.
RequestHandler Interface that defines the request lifecycle used by AbstractHttpClient.
RequestLogger HTTP request logger used by BasicHttpClient.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHttpClient Lightweight HTTP client that facilitates GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests using HttpURLConnection.
AsyncCallback Callback passed to an AsyncRequestExecutor so that the calling code can be notified when a request is complete or has thrown an exception.
AsyncHttpClient An HTTP client that completes all requests asynchronously using DoHttpRequestTask.
BasicHttpClient Minimal HTTP client that facilitates simple GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE requests.
BasicRequestHandler Default RequestHandler used by BasicHttpClient.
ConsoleRequestLogger Default RequestLogger used by BasicHttpClient.
HttpDelete An HTTP DELETE request.
HttpGet An HTTP GET request.
HttpPost An HTTP POST request.
HttpPut An HTTP PUT request.
HttpRequest Holds data for an HTTP request to be made with the attached HTTP client.
HttpResponse Minimal representation of the raw HTTP response copied from HttpURLConnection.
ParameterMap Parameter map knows offers convenience methods for chaining add()s as well as URL encoding.
 

Enum Summary
HttpMethod Enumerated type that represents an HTTP request method.
 

Exception Summary
HttpRequestException Custom exception class that holds an HttpResponse.
 

Package com.turbomanage.httpclient Description

Minimal HTTP client wrapping HttpURLConnection. The base class for all implementations is AbstractHttpClient. You can make asynchronous calls using AsyncHttpClient.

To get started, see BasicHttpClient.
